Create a FacebookForm HandlingFree Meta Search this whole document.Free Text SearchHello World Has 2 sections.HowtoStart a project Has 2 sections.Quickstart For CMS the quickstart package is called quickstart and this one gettingstarted, while `hst' is not part of the package name. I think all quickstart packages should have `quickstart' in their name and they also all should contain the project (product) name in their name. Or maybe there is some other consistent and clear naming scheme.
